Comment: Abilities: A047 (Multi Shot), Researchubertip (Tooltip - Learn - Extended)
Value: The hero's bow expertise allows them to shoot multiple arrows at once. |n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - Enables the release of 2 arrows at once.|n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - Enables the release of 3 arrows at once.|n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - Enables the release of 4 arrows at once.
